All sorts of engineers | TripleLift | New York, NY | Onsite | US Citizen

We're looking for software engineers to come join us and improve the state of digital advertising. Our core product is a native advertising ad exchange that's running tens of thousands of auctions each second while having to deal with a variety of challenging performance and scale issues. The team is lean and likes to move quickly so if interested definitely reach out and let me know! dgoldin@triplelift.com
